name: Roguelite Dungeon Crawler
description:
How far can you get in the dungeons?

The rules are:
1. Aid your character by tapping one of the magic items.
2. Character attacks have a Cooldown meter, when this reaches zero they will attack.
3. When a character's Health reaches zero, he/she dies.
4. Enemies have strengths and weaknesses in relation to your character: Fighter beats Archer, Archer beats Flying, Flying beats Fighter.
5. You can get information about all the characters and magic items by holding them down.
